title: (x) canoe.ca logo tech sans - Reykjavik Herra & Ungfru {Yves}
content:
who knows this one?  
thank you, anton

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906163934im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/textguess_5055.png)

 [‹ (x) New Good Housekeeping serif headlines - H&FJ Chronicle {David, Marc O}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906163934/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35086 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Communications" simple sans - Interstate {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906163934/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36809 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Anton Badinger

comments.content: It’s a mix between [Reykjavik](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906163934/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/psyops/reykjavik_sans_superset_ot/?sample_text=canoe.ca&sample_size=36) One (Herra, the male variant) and Two (Ungfru, the female variant), a terrific tech sans family designed by [Rodrigo Xavier Cavazos](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906163934/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Rodrigo%252BXavier%252BCavazos) and [Stefán Kjartansson](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906163934/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Stef%2525C3%2525A1n%252BKjartansson)
Lovely face - that’s one for the shopping list...

Bald Condensed: thank you for telling. the fonts are nice indeed – and very affordable.  
anton
I just love their pricing scheme. They’re killer faces at a killer price.
